features: Cards Debit Cards Other Information What is a debit card? A debit card is a convenient payment card that is linked to a Current Account, Savings Account or Investment Account (excluding TIA-i). When you make purchases with a debit card, the funds will be deducted directly from your savings account. You can use a debit card to make purchases online, in-store, and to make withdrawals from an ATM easily. Can I use my debit card in another country? Yes.
